3.9.5：
* support esp32-h2
* support erase button disable
* fix some bugs

3.9.4：
* support esp32-c6
* support esp32-c3/esp32-s3 flash encrytion
* add xmc flash fix
* support dut count in factory mode

3.9.3:
* support esp32-c2
* update finish UI show

3.9.2:
* fix configure file error
* update autostart process
